Cell.Data: Ballistic Machinegun: Machineguns fire long bursts that can inflict heavy damage and are excellent for suppressing enemies. However, a burst consumes 80%% of the soldier's TU to fire - limiting the mobility of the weapon. They are also Heavy weapons, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use them effectively. They use the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 60 STR (due to the 60 Recoil). Range: 25 Damage: 30 Kinetic Suppression: 120 Burst Mitigation: 5 Ammo Capacity: 30 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Recoil: 60 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 80%% TU 35 Acc x 10 shots

Scatter Laser: Machineguns fire long bursts that can inflict heavy damage and are excellent for suppressing enemies. However, a burst consumes 80%% of the soldier's TU to fire - limiting the mobility of the weapon. They are also Heavy weapons, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use them effectively. They use the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 60 STR (due to the 60 Recoil). Range: 25 Damage: 45 Energy Suppression: 120 Burst Mitigation: 8 Ammo Capacity: 30 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Recoil: 60 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 80%% TU 35 Acc x 10 shots

Plasma Caster: Machineguns fire long bursts that can inflict heavy damage and are excellent for suppressing enemies. However, a burst consumes 80%% of the soldier's TU to fire - limiting the mobility of the weapon. They are also Heavy weapons, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use them effectively. They use the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 60 STR (due to the 60 Recoil). Range: 25 Damage: 70 Energy Suppression: 150 Burst Mitigation: 12 Ammo Capacity: 30 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Recoil: 60 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 80%% TU 35 Acc x 10 shots

MAGSTORM: Machineguns fire long bursts that can inflict heavy damage and are excellent for suppressing enemies. However, a burst consumes 80%% of the soldier's TU to fire (unless paired with Predator armour) - limiting the mobility of the weapon. They are also Heavy weapons, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use them effectively. They use the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 60 STR (due to the 60 Recoil). Range: 25 Damage: 105 Kinetic Suppression: 120 Burst Mitigation: 18 Ammo Capacity: 30 shots Reaction Modifier: 0.5x Recoil: 60 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 80%% TU 35 Acc x 10 shots

Rocket Launcher: Rocket Launchers fire rockets (shown under the "Rockets" tab of the "Equipment" section) over long range. These generally have large blast areas and do medium damage to enemies and heavy damage to cover and terrain. Remember, enemies killed with explosives will not leave any recoverable items! The Rocket Launcher is a Heavy weapon, meaning a strong soldier is needed to use it effectively. It uses the lower of ACC and STR to determine accuracy and an additional penalty is incurred if the soldier has less than 60 STR (due to the 60 Recoil). Range: 30 Damage: (Rocket) Suppression: 60 Ammo Capacity: 1 rocket Reaction Modifier: N/A (no reaction fire) Recoil: 60 Recoil Reload Cost: 35 TU Fire Modes: - 50%% TU 75 Acc x 1 shot - 80%% TU 100 Acc x 1 shot
